dcterms:creator: Yu Zheng
Licia Capra
Ouri Wolfson
Hai Yang
dcterms:description: The PEMS-04 dataset contains traffic flow data collected from 307 sensors in the Bay Area, covering a period from January 1 to February 28, 2018. It is commonly used for traffic forecasting tasks.
dcterms:title: PEMS-04

dcterms:creator: Yu Zheng
Licia Capra
Ouri Wolfson
Hai Yang
dcterms:description: The PEMS-08 dataset contains traffic flow information collected from 170 sensors in the San Bernardino area, covering the period from July 1 to August 31, 2016. It is used for traffic forecasting tasks.
dcterms:title: PEMS-08

dcterms:creator: Yaguang Li
Rose Yu
Cyrus Shahabi
Yan Liu
dcterms:description: The BAY dataset contains traffic speed information from 325 sensors in the Bay Area, with data collected over a period of six months from January 1 to June 30, 2017. It is utilized for traffic forecasting tasks.
dcterms:title: BAY
